attributes.action: FREEZE Council Tax Payments for 2 months during COVID 19.
attributes.additional_details: As above. To support cash flow / reduction of income for the majority of households. (80% of income if applicable or statutory sick pay) As households will struggle with ALL household payments during this outbreak - it makes sense to review the current historic payment terms, Plus, Government staff won’t be using their resources to chase monies during this time, and can prioritise resources more effectively.
attributes.background: i.e. NO payments to be due on 1st April or 1st May - all Direct Debits to be changed.  Payments to start on 1st June until 1st March. (Still 10 months). So all still paid or accounted for within the current Tax Year.
